summary: A young woman attempts a "thru-hike" of the Appalachian Trail, the 2,170 mile footpath wandering the length of the Atlantic seaboard from Maine to Georgia.
cast: Amy Cale Peterson|Scott Speiser|Christopher McCutchen|Dick Barron|Chris Bettencourt|Justin Bradshaw|Betty Burnell|Mike Burnell|Gwendolyn Edwards|Jeremy Kaplan|Rick Mahoney|Keith Wasserman|Chris Welch
title: Southbounders
